content: hi in this free tutorial you ll learn how to crochet a fluffy dog step-by-step perfect for beginners who want to make a handmade gift using a hook and plush chunky yarn let s create a cute crocheted toy you can sell the finished product and post it social media please tag me as the pattern designer in instagram @crafterfrog i also have a free written pattern on ribblr https //ribblr com/pattern/dog-with-youtube-tutorial-crochet referrer=151307 subscribe to my channel https //www youtube com/channel/uczjkajajijqsdehxs-mxurw if you have any questions feel free to contact me happy crocheting
